results.name: Cold Start Quality & Topic Breadth (First Impression Test)

criteria_results.description: No episode in top 10 has credibility < 2

criteria_results.details: pass=True, rationale=The recommendations align well with the content hypothesis by surfacing high-quality content and dem...

llm_evaluation.rationale: The recommendations align well with the content hypothesis by surfacing high-quality content and demonstrating good topic breadth across major themes like AI, Startups, Crypto, and Macro. While AI is a prominent theme, other categories are sufficiently represented to offer a diverse first impression for a cold start user, successfully probing interests.

results.name: Personalization Differs from Cold Start (Centroid Shift Test)

criteria_results.description: At least 5 of top 10 episodes are different
VC Partner has higher avg similarity_score than cold start
VC Partner cold_start flag is false

criteria_results.details: pass=True, rationale=The recommendations demonstrate exceptional alignment with the user's content hypothesis, providing ...

llm_evaluation.rationale: The recommendations demonstrate exceptional alignment with the user's content hypothesis, providing deep specialization in AI/Tech infrastructure (85%) and appropriate cross-disciplinary content linking AI to macroeconomics and investment themes. The strong preference for strategic analysis over research papers is also perfectly met, indicating a successful personalization shift from a cold start.

}
